channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla says it started building initial versions of an affordable car, posts a steep sales decline

item.title: Flight attendant gets 18.5 years after recording girls in airplane bathroom
item.description: A flight attendant accused of secretly filming young girls in airplane lavatories has been sentenced to just under 20 years in prison

item.title: HR Exec Who Was Seen Wrapped in CEO's Arms in Viral Coldplay Video Remains in Role as Company Moves Forward

item.title: Mayor says 3 officers were wounded and a person is dead after a shooting in Lorain, Ohio
